revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Celestial Tower |image = [[File:Celestial Tower.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Celestial Tower. |tokens = 206,500 |location = Unova Route 7 }} '''Celestial Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,803,000 HP.
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Joyce || [[File:Musharna.png|40px]] Musharna |- | [[File:School_Kid_(female).png|40px]] School Kid Alberta || [[File:Litwick.png|40px]] Litwick |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Elgyem.png|40px]] Elgyem || [[File:Pokéfan_(male).png|40px]] Pokéfan Jude || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy |- | [[File:Pokéfan_(female).png|40px]] Pokéfan Georgia || [[File:Cubchoo.png|40px]] Cubchoo |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus || [[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Micki || [[File:Espeon.png|40px]] Espeon |- | [[File:Nurse.png|40px]] Nurse Dixie || [[File:Leavanny.png|40px]] Leavanny |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter || [[File:Socialite.png|40px]] Socialite Grace || [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia |- | [[File:Gentleman.png|40px]] Gentleman Daniel || [[File:Umbreon.png|40px]] Umbreon |}

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Litwick.png|40px]] Litwick || rowspan=4|<center> 25,000,000 || rowspan=2|[[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Bryce || [[File:Elgyem.png|40px]] Elgyem || rowspan=4|<center>14,000,000 |- | [[File:Duosion.png|40px]] Duosion |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Psychic_(female).png|40px]] Psychic Sarah || [[File:Yamask.png|40px]] Yamask |- | [[File:Gothorita.png|40px]] Gothorita |}
==Items==

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 2 || 49.99% || 48.11% || 45.24% || 40.43% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 1 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 22.62% || 20.21% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || 1 || 2.01% || 2.61% || 3.52% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || 1 || 2.01% || 2.61% || 3.52% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || 2 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.25% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || 1 || 0.25% || 0.40% || 0.63% || 1.01% |- | {{Bag2|Twisted Spoon}} || 1 || 0.25% || 0.40% || 0.63% || 1.01% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Galar]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
